required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 09, 2023
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Safety of Sticker Pad Containing Essential Oil Containing Lavender and Ylang-ylang Oil
clinical_study.official_title: Safety of Sticker Pad Containing Essential Oil Containing Lavender and Ylang-ylang Oil Attached to the Collar for Decrease Blood Pressure in Healthy Volunteer

brief_summary.textblock: The aims of the study were to evaluate safety of sticker pads containing lavender and ylang ylang oil in healthy volunteers.

detailed_description.textblock: The lavender and ylang ylang oil pad was attached to the shirts of healthy volunteers for 2 hours. The outcomes were evaluated before, during and 30 minutes after removal of the pad. Adverse reactions, irritation score, and quality of life were assessed. Blood pressure and pulse rate were also measured

primary_outcome.measure: Adverse reactions of the respiratory tract, skin, eye, and central nervous system
primary_outcome.description: The severity scores were 0 (no symptoms) to 3 (severe symptoms)

secondary_outcome.measure: Irritation of eye, respiratory, other neurological, and toxicity reaction
secondary_outcome.description: Using a 0 to 100 scale, following an increase of severity
Measure systemic blood pressure in mmHg
Measure diastolic blood pressure in mmHg
Using a score of 1 (no problems) to 5 (severe problem)

arm_group.arm_group_label: Sticker pads containing lavender and ylang ylang oil
arm_group.description: Sticker pads , size 160 mm2, were produced by a certified ISO 9001 manufacturer and contained 0.3% lavender oil and 0.7% ylang ylang oil. The sticker pad was attached to the shirts of healthy volunteers for 2 hours. The outcomes were evaluated before, during and 30 minutes after removal of the pad.

intervention.intervention_name: Sticker pads containing lavender and ylang ylang oil
intervention.description: Sticker pads , size 160 mm2, were produced by a certified ISO 9001 manufacturer and contained 0.3% lavender oil and 0.7% ylang ylang oil. The sticker pad was attached to the shirts of healthy volunteers for 2 hours. The outcomes were evaluated before, during and 30 minutes after removal of the pad.
intervention.arm_group_label: Sticker pads containing lavender and ylang ylang oil

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- age 18 to 60 years
- no allergic history of lavender and ylang ylang oil
- no dermatological diseases, immunocompromised diseases, seizures, asthma, or respiratory diseases.
Exclusion Criteria:
- an unstable condition of other diseases
- olfactory problems
- pregnancy
- lactation
